text: East Legon is a town in the Accra Metropolitan district, a district of the Greater Accra Region of Ghana. East Legon has a Total area of 4.95 km² (1.91 mi²) and a Total distance of 9.36 km (5.82 mi). It's an 11 minutes drive from the Kotoka International Airport and 38 minutes drive from the Tema Harbour. ==References== Category:Populated places in the Greater Accra Region Category:Greater Accra Region
title: East Legon
